TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDesignerSerializationManager implements class System.IServiceProvider

summary.span: 提供可以管理设计时序列化的接口。

span.span: Provides an interface that can manage design-time serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器可以利用访问服务可用于管理设计时序列化进程。A designer can utilize to access services useful to managing design-time serialization processes. 例如，实现设计器序列化管理器的类可以使用此接口来创建对象、 查找类型、 标识对象和自定义特定类型的序列化。For example, a class that implements the designer serialization manager can use this interface to create objects, look up types, identify objects, and customize the serialization of particular types. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用序列化和反序列化代码 DOM 语句。The following example illustrates how to use to serialize and deserialize Code DOM statements. [!code-cpp[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/CPP/idesignerserializationmanagersample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/CS/idesignerserializationmanagersample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/VB/idesignerserializationmanagersample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddSerializationProvider(class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider provider) cil managed

param.name: provider
param.span: 要添加的序列化提供程序。

span.span: The serialization provider to add.

summary.span: 向序列化管理器添加指定的序列化提供程序。

span.span: Adds the specified serialization provider to the serialization manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将自定义序列化提供程序添加到序列化管理器。This method adds a custom serialization provider to the serialization manager. 序列化提供程序可以为特定类型的对象或特定类型的对象集提供自定义序列化程序。Serialization providers can provide custom serializers for a particular type of object or set of types of objects. 在序列化期间，将查询每个自定义序列化提供程序，以便为特定数据类型返回一个序列化程序（如果自定义序列化提供程序可以提供序列化程序的话）。During serialization, each custom serialization provider is queried to return a serializer for a specific data type, if it can provide one. 序列化管理器在为特定类型使用默认序列化程序之前，使用此方法提供的自定义序列化程序。The serialization manager uses the custom serializer provided by this method before using the default serializer for a particular type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Context As ContextStack

summary.span: 获取基于堆栈的、用户定义的存储区域，该区域对于序列化程序之间的通信十分有用。

span.span: Gets a stack-based, user-defined storage area that is useful for communication between serializers.
A that stores data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此存储区域到序列化程序提供的对象上下文信息的通信。This storage area provides communication of object context information to serializers. 正在序列化的对象的上下文信息可以存储和访问通过此。Context information about objects that are being serialized can be stored and accessed through this .

summary.span: 创建指定类型的实例并将其添加到已命名实例的集合中。

span.span: Creates an instance of the specified type and adds it to a collection of named instances.
The newly created object instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象实现如果添加到设计时容器`addToContainer`参数是`true`。Objects that implement are added to the design-time container if the `addToContainer` parameter is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Properties As PropertyDescriptorCollection

summary.span: 指示可利用可用序列化程序进行序列化的自定义属性。

span.span: Indicates custom properties that can be serializable with available serializers.

value.span: 包含要进行序列化的属性的 。

span.span: A containing the properties to be serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可包含空集合。This property can contain an empty collection. 序列化程序也不应假定存在这样的属性。A serializer should never assume that such properties exist. 在派生的类或实现定义此处公开的属性集。A derived class or implementation of defines the set of properties that are exposed here.

span.para: 可以通过用户代码填充此属性。它可能足以调用的来填充此集合。如果不存在任何自定义属性，序列化管理器必须返回一个空集合。
This property can be populated by user code. It may be sufficient to call of to populate this collection. The serialization manager must return an empty collection if no custom properties exist.

span.span: This object must have been added using .

summary.span: 从序列化管理器移除自定义的序列化提供程序。

span.span: Removes a custom serialization provider from the serialization manager.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReportError(object errorInformation) cil managed

param.name: errorInformation
param.span: 要报告的错误。

span.span: The error to report.

param.span: 该信息对象可以是任何对象类型。

span.span: This information object can be of any object type.

param.span: 如果它是一个异常，则将提取该异常的消息并报告给用户。

span.span: If it is an exception, the message of the exception is extracted and reported to the user.

param.span: 如果它是任何其他类型，则将调用 ，向用户显示该信息。

span.span: If it is any other type, is called to display the information to the user.
Reports an error in serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化管理器是否支持多个错误记录在其实现，它可以存储将来的报表位置中一次显示所有遇到的错误的错误的信息对象。If the serialization manager supports logging multiple errors in its implementation of , it can store the error information object for a future report where all the errors encountered can be displayed at once. 如果此方法将存储在多个错误，可以在调用此方法后继续序列化。If this method stores multiple errors, serialization can continue after a call to this method. 如果此方法不支持日志记录多个错误，此方法应引发异常，这将中止序列化。If this method does not support logging multiple errors, this method should throw an exception, which aborts serialization. > [!NOTE] > 序列化管理器应永远不会引发异常的序列化期间遇到的错误。The serialization manager should never throw an exception for errors encountered during serialization. 它应引发反序列化期间的异常。It should only throw an exception during deserialization. 否则，用户会变得混淆，因为保存文档应永远不会失败。Otherwise, users become confused because saving the document should never fail.

summary.span: 当 无法在序列化管理器的名称表中找到指定名称时发生。

span.span: Occurs when cannot locate the specified name in the serialization manager's name table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件为序列化程序提供按需创建对象的方法，以便序列化程序不必通过依赖项执行对象创建。This event provides a way for a serializer to create an object on demand, so that the serializer does not have to order object creation by dependency. 此事件的委托将在序列化或反序列化完成后立即清除。The delegate for this event is cleared immediately after serialization or deserialization is complete.

span.span: Occurs when serialization is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在序列化或反序列化完成时引发该事件。This event is raised when serialization or deserialization is complete. 通常情况下，序列化代码被编写为发出序列化数据，并且通常不要求与状态相关的检查和处理。Generally, serialization code is written to emit serialization data and does not typically require state-related checking and processing. 如果有必要在整个序列化过程中保留状态数据，则可以通过序列化程序设置并访问这些数据，序列化程序可侦听 事件，并在序列化之后清除这些数据。If it is necessary to maintain state data throughout serialization, data can be set and accessed by a serializer, which can listen to the event, and clear the data after serialization. 因为序列化期间，可以重复使用序列化程序和剩余的状态数据或打开的流可能不正确，可能必须序列化之后还原正确的状态。Restoring the proper state after serialization can be important because serializers can be reused during serialization, and leftover state data or open streams might not be correct. 例如，如果序列化程序需要写入到另一个文件，如资源文件是低效的设计完成后关闭该文件的序列化程序。For example, if a serializer needs to write to another file, such as a resource file, it is inefficient to design the serializer to close the file when finished. 序列化对象图通常需要多个序列化程序。Serializing an object graph usually requires several serializers. 将打开和关闭次数多的资源文件。The resource file would be opened and closed many times. 相反，资源文件可以序列化结束时通过关闭侦听到的对象事件。Instead, the resource file can be closed at the end of serialization by an object that listened to the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetName (object instance, string name);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetName(object instance, string name) cil managed
Public Sub SetName (instance As Object, name As String)
public: void SetName(System::Object ^ instance, System::String ^ name);
abstract member SetName : obj * string -> unit

param.name: instance
param.span: 要命名的对象实例。

span.span: The object instance to name.

param.name: name
param.span: 提供给实例的名称。

span.span: The name to give the instance.

summary.span: 设置指定的现有对象的名称。

span.span: Sets the name of the specified existing object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 需要创建和然后命名对象的实例而无需使用时，此方法很有用。This method is useful when it is necessary to create and then name an instance of an object without using . 如果试图重命名现有对象或者试图为新对象指定一个已被使用的名称，则将引发异常。An exception is thrown if you try to rename an existing object or if you try to give a new object a name that is already taken.
